title: Betrayed by Blood
description: My family set me up. Now I’m getting even.Welcome to my world, where having unregistered fire magic makes me a hunted woman, and my family is trying to kill me, in order to cover up a dark family secret.My only way out of this nightmare is to infiltrate the country’s most dangerous prison and rescue a wealthy Elemental. In return, I get a brand-new life where I won’t be looking over my shoulder every single day.There’s only one problem.The man who holds my future in his hands is my old flame, Gabriel Vanguard, and he tends to hold a grudge.New York is about to get messy.
author: L.A. McGinnis
